content: पाणिः [पण्-इण् आयाभावः; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Uṇ. 4. 132</ls>] {@--1@} The hand; दानेन पाणिर्न तु कंकणेन (विभाति) <ls>Bh. 2. 71</ls>; often at the end of <ab>comp.</ab> in the sense of ‘carrying in the hand’; as चक्र°, खड्ग° &c.; पाणिं ग्रह् or पीड् ‘to take the hand of, lead to the altar, marry.’ पाणौ कृ to hold by the hand, marry; पाणौकरणं ‘marriage’. {@--2@} <ab>Ved.</ab> A hoof. --णिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} A market.
